Articles.Content: Fly a plane around the world, Submit the mission report (F3) also show the plane you made it in, but the catch is, you have to stay below 14 kilometers ASL

This challenge needs some serious beefing up. In its current form, it is an easy challenge made hard because of the very long play time required.

Plus, it is unclear if/what mod are allowed and how you would rank participants.

It is also somewhat required for challenge hoster to post their own attempt at their challenge.

You might want to check the submission guide:
